ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a 24-year-old full-stack developer with a passion for both front-end and back-end technologies. With a background as a self-employed VFX Artist/Cutter/Graphic Designer, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise.
ABOUT.COLLABORATION: Let's collaborate and build something truly remarkable together!

SKILLSET.DESCRIPTION: I bring a diverse knowledge of both front-end and back-end technologies, blending creative design with technical expertise.
